message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $140?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can offer you a slight discount. I can sell it to you for $145.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I value your product and would like to continue negotiating. Could you possibly lower the price to $140?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $142.50.
I'm glad we're still discussing this, Alice. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Would that be acceptable to you?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can offer you a slight concession, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $142.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm willing to pay $141 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $143. It's the best I can do.
I've done my best to negotiate, Alice, but I can't agree to $143. My final offer is $142 for the product.
